verses.text: \w Masters|strong="G2962"\w*, \w give|strong="G3930"\w* \w unto|strong="G1401"\w* \add your\add* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* that which is \w just|strong="G1342"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w equal|strong="G2471"\w*; \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* a \w Master|strong="G2962"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w Continue|strong="G4342"\w* in \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w*, and \w watch|strong="G1127"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="G2169"\w*;

\w Withal|strong="G0260"\w* \w praying|strong="G4336"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* would \w open|strong="G0455"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w* a \w door|strong="G2374"\w* of \w utterance|strong="G3056"\w*, to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* the \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I \w am|strong="G1210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* in \w bonds|strong="G1210"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* I may \w make|strong="G5319"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w I|strong="G3165"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*.

\w Walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w toward|strong="G4314"\w* them that \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w*, \w redeeming|strong="G1805"\w* the \w time|strong="G2540"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G0741"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w speech|strong="G3056"\w* \add be\add* \w alway|strong="G3842"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w seasoned|strong="G0741"\w* with \w salt|strong="G0217"\w*, that ye may \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* to \w answer|strong="G0611"\w* \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w man|strong="G1520"\w*.

\w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w my|strong="G1691"\w* \w state|strong="G2596"\w* \w shall|strong="G1107"\w* \w Tychicus|strong="G5190"\w* \w declare|strong="G1107"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \add who is\add* a \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w minister|strong="G1249"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fellowservant|strong="G4889"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*:

\w Whom|strong="G3739"\w* I have \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w purpose|strong="G5124"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he might \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w estate|strong="G4012"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w comfort|strong="G3870"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*;

\w With|strong="G4862"\w* \w Onesimus|strong="G3682"\w*, a \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \add one\add* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*. They shall make \w known|strong="G1107"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \add are done\add* \w here|strong="G5602"\w*.

\w Aristarchus|strong="G0708"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w fellowprisoner|strong="G4869"\w* \w saluteth|strong="G0782"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Marcus|strong="G3138"\w*, \w sisterâ€™s son|strong="G0431"\w* to \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w*, (\w touching|strong="G4012"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w*: \w if|strong="G1437"\w* he \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w receive|strong="G1209"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*;)

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, which is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Justus|strong="G2459"\w*, who \w are|strong="G5607"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*. \w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w* \add are my\add* \w fellowworkers|strong="G4904"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* have \w been|strong="G1096"\w* a \w comfort|strong="G3931"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*.

\w Epaphras|strong="G1889"\w*, who \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \add one\add* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, a \w servant|strong="G1401"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w saluteth|strong="G0782"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w always|strong="G3842"\w* labouring \w fervently|strong="G0075"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye may \w stand|strong="G2476"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w complete|strong="G4137"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w bear|strong="G3140"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w record|strong="G3140"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* a \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w zeal|strong="G2205"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \add that are\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Laodicea|strong="G2993"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Hierapolis|strong="G2404"\w*.
\w Luke|strong="G3065"\w*, the \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w physician|strong="G2395"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Demas|strong="G1214"\w*, \w greet|strong="G0782"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w Salute|strong="G0782"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* which are \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Laodicea|strong="G2993"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Nymphas|strong="G3564"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* which is \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w epistle|strong="G1992"\w* is \w read|strong="G0314"\w* \w among|strong="G3844"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w cause|strong="G4160"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* it be \w read|strong="G0314"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* of the \w Laodiceans|strong="G2994"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w likewise|strong="G2532"\w* \w read|strong="G0314"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \add epistle\add* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w Laodicea|strong="G2993"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G2036"\w* to \w Archippus|strong="G0751"\w*, Take heed \w to|strong="G0991"\w* the \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* thou hast \w received|strong="G3880"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* thou \w fulfil|strong="G4137"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*.

The \w salutation|strong="G0783"\w* by the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* of \w me|strong="G1699"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*. \w Remember|strong="G3421"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w bonds|strong="G1199"\w*. \w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*. Written from Rome to the Colossians by Tychicus and Onesimus.
